title: Study Abroad Guidelines
description: Complete guide for students planning to pursue higher education internationally

steps.description: Compare countries based on education quality, cost, and career opportunities
details: USA: World-class universities, diverse programs, high costs
UK: Shorter degree duration, prestigious institutions, moderate costs
Canada: Affordable education, immigration opportunities, multicultural
Australia: Quality education, work opportunities, pleasant climate
Germany: Low tuition fees, strong engineering programs, language barrier
Singapore: Asian hub, excellent facilities, competitive admission
